alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Scott County; Northwest Yell County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 4:46AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Logan, northeastern Scott and western Yell Counties through 530 AM CDT... At 446 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles south of Ratcliff to near Magazine to 6 miles south of Booneville. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Booneville... Paris... Danville... Magazine... Blue Mountain... Stonehouse Recreation Area... Fourche Valley... Mount Magazine... Belleville... Havana... Caulksville... Corinth... Ranger... Wing... Chismville... Bluffton... Rover... Corley... Grayson... Blue Ball... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
